item.title: Additional Resources
item.description: Interactive lessons Posit Cloud A non-programmer friendly introduction to the R language: Hands-On Programming with R Swirl: learn R interactively tidyverse suite of packages Packages homepage An intermediate-level exploration of data analysis using R’s tidyverse packages: R for Data Science R for Data Science: Exercise Solutions

item.title: Getting started with R and RStudio on your personal machine
item.description: Please note, these instructions are for installing R/RStudio on your personal machine and do not apply to Lurie managed devices. Security documentation When handling R and RStudio on a Lurie managed device, please refer to the following security documentation. Security Best Practices for Using R and Rstudio in the Intro to R workshop: here Guidance on the Use of R and RStudio: here Install R (first) R and RStudio are two separate programs.
